summary: INTERMITTENT FAILURE OF ELECTRONIC THROTTLE IN 2001 VOLVO S60.  FORTUNATELY OCCURRED IN PARKING LOT WITH VEHICLE AT REST.  VEHICLE SUDDENLY STOPPED RESPONDING TO THROTTLE.  TURNED OFF VEHICLE AND DID VISUAL AND TACTILE SURVEY OF THROTTLE PEDAL AREA.  RESTARTED VEHICLE AND PROBLEM DISAPPEARED.  COULD HAVE BEEN VERY SERIOUS SITUATION HAD VEHICLE BEEN AT SPEED. *TR
